name: Sulewski v. Ambrose et ux., Appellants

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Sulewski v. Ambrose et ux., Appellants.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed; costs on appellants.
Mr. Justice Jones took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Paul B. Mahler, with him John H. Hibbard, for appellants.
Frank Townend, with him Michael G. McHugh, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Sulewski v. Ambrose et ux., Appellants.
Argued April 26, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Paul B. Mahler, with him John H. Hibbard, for appellants.
Frank Townend, with him Michael G. McHugh, for appellees.
June 28, 1971:
